/usr/bin/c++         CMakeFiles/prepared_statement.dir/prepared_statement.cpp.o  -o prepared_statement  -L/home/jinwei/cmake/make_tut/mysql-connector-cpp/cppconn -rdynamic ../driver/libmysqlcppconn-static.a -lmysqlclient -lpthread -lz -lm -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/jinwei/cmake/make_tut/mysql-connector-cpp/cppconn
